gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. Now I want to train a large language model for code comment generation tasks specifically focused on Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Name of the module and its functionality is as follows: 
Sorry, but the given Verilog code seems to be corrupted or not in a human-readable format. It's filled with non-alphanumeric and special characters, which don't represent any kind of meaningful Verilog code.

For a comprehensive analysis, the code should be in valid Verilog syntax. Please provide the appropriate Verilog code so that a meaningful analysis can be done.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows:

In order for me to answer your questions about the input/output ports and their role, please provide the script in a valid Verilog format. With that information, I can assist you in understanding the structure and functionality of the Verilog module.

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows:

The content contains non-alphanumeric and special characters, and is thus impossible to decipher. Consequently, any internal signals present within the code can't be identified, nor their functions explained.

Once the valid Verilog code is supplied, I'll be able to provide the details in the requested format:
